Text:
INSTALATION NOTES:
1. Install the game.
2. Start the game and create an account / use already existing (also it is necessary to put the checkbox on the "Remember Me").
3. When asked to enter the key - just click "OK."
4. Enable offline mode in the Uplay.
5. Enjoy.

If you can't press "OK" on the key request just close the launcher, go into the folder C:  Program Files (x86)  Ubisoft  Ubisoft Game Launcher (for x64 systems) | C :  Program Files  Ubisoft  Ubisoft Game Launcher (for x86 systems), delete Uplay.exe and rename Uplay_Cracked.exe in Uplay.exe. Then run the game again and repeat step 3 and 4.
